title: Illaoi Snow Day skin ideas?
body:
How about instead of the kraken, she's holding a poro by the horn. Or even a mini Poro King Plush that squeaks during her smashes? Maybe a poro Bisquit instead?

As for the tentacles? It'd be fun/cruel to see a bunch of poros stack up by size, and start smashing their faces on the enemies.
it'd be a bit weird for her E though...

What about clothes though? Any thoughts? the Recall?

replies.body:
you can't just make everything fucking poros.
goddamn.

> [{quoted}](name=A steezy Scizor,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Lsokd7f2,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-06-15T09:19:51.008+0000)
>
> you can't just make everything fucking poros.
> goddamn.

op is your brother dont be mean to him
No no just regular poros, nothing x rated >.>

Q could just be a big pink poro tongue out of the plushie :P

Cool idea though, the less obvious snow day skin ideas often wind up being the best. Like Bard :D

imagining some tongues standing tall around the map.. 
{{champion:6}} will love that

or the tentacles could be candy canes?
wait, that's for Christmas.
